attributes.action: denounce the "John Lewis List"  and exemplify fairness and equality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the people, demand that MP expenses should be expunnged in relation to the aptly dubbed "John Lewis List", not merely amending the existing clauses. All MP's should be within the same Tax structure as the general public and not a seperate, internally audited entity. We, the people, insist on a system of parity within the Public Tax system, and we insist on MP's not taking  advantage with "special priviledges" which seem to be only applicable to members of the Barr system, all MPs and the House of Commons. It is long overdue and we, the people, demand that MP's should be on par with the Public that they serve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
